name: HENTAI CASINO \ 性赌场
description:
HENTAI CASINO \ 性赌场

HENTAI CASINO \ 性赌场 is a card game based on a very famous game mechanic solitaire,
in the game you will need to assemble a deck of cards in a certain order in a specially allotted time,
for each completed level you will open the next one and a new girl will appear with it.

Collect cards, open levels and do not forget to pack in a special time

Game features:
  • Famous game mechanics
  • Many beautiful pictures with girls
  • Cartoon atmosphere
